extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Arctic Oscillation in polar vortex and J.A.R.V.I.S. - an advanced AI system that controls and regulates different functions of Iron Man's suit, including managing atmospheric circulation, controlling air flows, and adjusting strength variations as needed have a Regulating System
extended_metaphor.arctic_oscillation: Arctic Oscillation in polar vortex maintains a balanced atmospheric circulation by controlling the flow of air, affecting weather patterns and temperatures
extended_metaphor.j.a.r.v.i.s._-_an_advanced_ai_system_tha: J.A.R.V.I.S. in Iron Man functions as an advanced AI system that regulates the different functions of the suit, ensuring atmospheric circulation is managed, air flows are controlled, and strength variations are adjusted as required

extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Arctic Oscillation in polar vortex and J.A.R.V.I.S. - an advanced AI system that controls and regulates different functions of Iron Man's suit, including managing atmospheric circulation, controlling air flows, and adjusting strength variations as needed utilize Negative and Positive Phases
extended_metaphor.arctic_oscillation: Arctic Oscillation in polar vortex utilizes fluctuations between negative and positive phases to confine or allow cold air to impact different regions
extended_metaphor.j.a.r.v.i.s._-_an_advanced_ai_system_tha: Similar to the Arctic Oscillation, J.A.R.V.I.S. employs negative and positive phases to control and adjust different functions of Iron Man's suit, confining or allowing specific actions or capabilities as needed

extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Arctic Oscillation in polar vortex and J.A.R.V.I.S. - an advanced AI system that controls and regulates different functions of Iron Man's suit, including managing atmospheric circulation, controlling air flows, and adjusting strength variations as needed demonstrate Strength Variation
extended_metaphor.arctic_oscillation: Arctic Oscillation in polar vortex varies the strength of the system to either confine cold air to certain regions or allow it to meander southward
extended_metaphor.j.a.r.v.i.s._-_an_advanced_ai_system_tha: In a similar fashion, J.A.R.V.I.S. adjusts the strength of the system to either confine certain functions or allow flexibility and adaptability within Iron Man's suit
